readme:
# ice-cold-syntax theme

A theme I created for Atom. Uses vibrant cool colors along with a rich red
to help differentiate between different syntax. I plan on eventually creating
a package to match the overall editor to the syntax theme. Also might change
the syntax theme a little more over more hours of use.

![A screenshot of your theme](https://github.com/tannadev/atom-ice-cold-theme/blob/master/ice-cold-theme.png?raw=true)
